mapper.insert: INSERT INTO testlib.bookmember (id, pass, name,email,team,cell) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name},#{email},#{team},#{cell})
mapper.update: UPDATE testlib.bookmember SET pass = #{password},email = #{email},address = #{address},cell = #{cell},home = #{home} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TPRLIB.GR_INSA WHERE ASABN = #{id} FETCH first 1 rows only
SELECT A.id,A.name,A.email,A.address,A.cell,A.home, B.rentdate, B.returndate FROM testlib.bookmember as A ,BOOKRENT as B WHERE current date > B.returndate AND B.rentchk ='2' and A.id=B.id
SELECT A.name, A.id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKRENT B WHERE B.rentdate > current date -30day GROUP BY id) numborrow FROM testlib.bookmember AS A ORDER BY numborrow DESC
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKRENT B WHERE B.rentdate > date_sub(current date, interval 30 day) AND B.id=A.id ) AS numborrow FROM testlib.bookmember A ORDER BY team
